content: you may find this pattern for free on my blog supported by ads or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf version here on ravelry thank you this cozy chunky afghan works up fairly quickly and is made with a simple stitch pattern which alternates single_crochet and double_crochet stitches the pattern calls for 11 5mm p hook pattern gives a 36 x40 lapghan size with tips for adjusting the size
